product details.description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.BRUSHED FLEECE: 8.3 oz soft brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece for staying cozy and keeping warm..HOODED SWEATSHIRT: A classic everyday essential, this hooded sweatshirt is casual and comfortable. Throw it on for running errands or layer it with a collared shirt for a more dressed up look..DETAILS: Features three panel lined hood with metal grommets and adjustable drawcord, full length center front zipper, and hand pockets. Athletic rib trim at sleeve and bottom hem.
product details.productName: Amazon Essentials Men's Full-Zip Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall)

Product reviews.review: I’m a 5’8” 173 lb. male. I usually wear a medium or large depending on the brand and style of shirt or jacket. Here I chose large based on reviews. I wanted the hoodie to be roomy enough to layer over other shirts. Looks like I made the right call. The large is comfortably roomy without being too big.I want to compliment the manufacturer on the quality of this hoodie. It’s very soft, warm and thick. It doesn’t feel like a generic bargain hoodie, but instead has a higher-end style to it. All this at a very bargain price. I very much recommend this item to anyone looking for a comfortable sweater for cooler weather.

Amazon Essentials Men's Full-Zip Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall) is a must-have for anyone seeking comfort, style, and the perfect fit. This cozy fleece sweatshirt not only keeps you warm but also adds a touch of casual sophistication to your wardrobe. The full-zip design offers versatility, and the availability in Big & Tall sizes ensures that everyone can enjoy a comfortable and stylish fit. Whether you're running errands or just relaxing at home, this sweatshirt is an essential addition to your collection.

I like this hoodie, it is definitely great quality, bright color- and feels good. It does a little small I’d say. Got it for such a good price to!Will definitely buy it again, especially if it goes on sale.

This was listed at a super low price and I love stripes (and hoodies), so I grabbed it. I'm a medium in womens, so I ordered a small (it's mens) and it fits nicely. Very warm, not super flattering because it's cut for a man's body, but comfy to lounge in.

I'm satisfied with the hoodie. I also bought a zip up  Fleece Vest in the same exact:"Buffalo Plaid" pattern (aka checkerboard, or Americanized Scottish) and they both fit perfectly and are durable, and comfortable and easy to clean and keeps me warm. I would but again, definitely, if I had too, but I trust it'll last a long time. They actually did a great job on the quality of craftsmanship with the Amazon Essentials hoodie and vest. I'd buy a matching hat and pants to go with these in Amazon Essentials brand, as well, if it's available. It's a popular pattern, especially in December and January, but, at least I know "Buffalo Plaid" is more of a Scottish thing, than people realize. Which is appropriate, as that runs in the family. I just see everyone wearing it these days and shake my head about it. But pattern aside, the importance of this review, is to justify that Amazon Essentials is excellent high quality craftsmanship in their personal brand of clothing line. I ONLY give credit like this if it's earned and worth mentioning. And they make great winter weather clothes, apparently, as I'm a satisfied customer with purchases like the hoodie and vest.

This is really a beautiful jacket but it didn't work for me as a woman. I wanted a regular, not oversized fit, so I bought a Small. I would normally buy a Medium in women's tops and bottoms. It's snug around the hips (I am not particularly hippy and don't have much of a belly). I can zip it and it looks fine but it feels tight. The sleeves are too long for me so there are a lot of folds/bumps. If I sized up for the hips , the rest of the jacket and especially the sleeves would be too big. So I am returning it. I also was looking for a lightweight sweatshirt jacket. This one I would call medium weight - not really thick and bulky like some, but it does have some cush to it. It's really soft and snuggly and if it fit me better, I'd keep it even though it's a little heavier than I wanted.

I did not expect much.  I expected slightly scratchy, and a little thin for the price.  But I was nicely surprised. The material is soft, comfortable and it is well made... and warm. Zipper is durable, works well, and holds up to washing.  If there is one complaint, it was that the cuffs are a little loose, but if my arms and hards were bigger, then I might have appreciated that.  Definitely as good as any named brand product of this type at a fraction of the price.

This Amazon brand is not quality by anymeans. I got some Sweatpants and Zipper Hoodies. I wrote a review about the sweatpants my feeling is they are bit Off the size and fit just feel a lil weird but I kept them. Now the Sweatshirts... I bought 7 and they shipped in 3 separate shipments on 3 consecutive days... 2 then 4 then 1- Very wasteful.  Job security for the delivery people I guess. lol. So I try on the first 2 that arrived. They were very snug I immediately packed them back up for return.  I wear Hanes XL all winter fits very good comfortable fit I have an XXL Hanes that is big on me for when I wear  heavy sweatshirts under it.So today I get the second shipment... set aside 2 XL for return.  Try on The XXL and it was a better fit but still not near as comfortable as my Hanes. So now I inspected the actual garment and access the quality.... And the Zipper is plastic.... And the cuffs and waistband just are there. They don't taper or cinch properly.  So the air can flow up around the waist. The wrists just float they don't fit to your wrist... I only bought the Amazon Essentials because sale price was 1/3 of original... Why not give it a try. I hate returning stuff. I was very disappointed horrible fit and quality is disappointing.  The actual material is pretty light weight but seems ok. I just noticed though on the Amazon ones you can see the stitching on the outside... on the should wrists waist arms. Pockets I get you can't avoid it but my Hanes stitching is seen on the inside.You can buy if it is cheap on sale. I am keeping the XXL sweatshirts(really XL) but be aware you won't be 100% on the fit. I was like eehhhh for $8 I will try. I bought these hoping to regularly wear the XL around the house and the XXL over other warm clothing out in the cold weather. Now I will probably just wear the XXLs on occasion but not every day all day like my Hanes. The XLs are going back.Just an honest review. And disappointment .Now I have to stop by a Kohls for the easiest way for me to return because they give like 6 weeks to do it and do drive by a Kohls when I go to Walmart every couple weeks.

I bought this hoodie on a flash sale. Took a chance on an Amazon brand hoodie and it’s actually really nice. It feels soft and the fit is as expected. The color, however, looks more orange in the photo online, but in person it really does look like its name “nutmeg”. More like a brownish orange than a regular dark orange. I actually like the nutmeg color better than regular orange. I haven’t washed it yet, but I’m hoping it doesn’t shrink, so we’ll see. I bought a mens M and I usually buy L in women’s clothing. Happy with this Amazon hoodie and I would consider buying more in the future.

I've purchased it about 3 months ago. It's comfortable and warm. I do wear it all the time. The quality is as expected for the price: the color is fading, piling build up fairly quickly, and sheds decent amount of lint every time I wash (I do wash after each wear). This one probably won't last more than a season or two. I'd be surprised if I get to keep it fore more than 2 years. If this meets your expectation for the price, I think it's a decent buy. Otherwise, it might be better off putting few extra bucks to get a higher quality one.

product details.description: Heavyweight fleece hoodie with front zipper closure and two front pockets.Constructed with soft and durable 13oz 60 perercent Ring-Spun Cotton, 40 percent Polyester fleece.Relaxed fit for superior comfort. Famous for its premium thickness and weight.Double-needle coverseamed neck, armholes, and waistband. Double-ply self fabric lined hood.Rib cuffs and waistband made with Lycra for comfort and long wear
product details.productName: Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Full Zip Fleece Hoodie

Product reviews.review: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He loves it. Very thick fabric and really warm. Very high quality. I would say better made then his Carhart hoodie. Bought a 3xl so it would be oversized but it fit like a 2xl so I would maybe size up from the size you want.
Nice hoodie. Real warm and comfortable. Zipper is on the wrong side but I think that’s a Chinese thing and not that big of a deal
I love it 😍 it's perfect!! Great material! Perfect fit size is right on!!! It's a great product! Will definitely purchase from here again!💯
Nice and thick and it's worth the purchase! Very happy with this product

Its a thicker sweater than most, very soft on the inside.  We did wash it once and the zipper fell off, so we exchanged it right away and received a new one.  We made sure going forward that it was zipped up before drying it.
Best quality Pro Club nothing comes close

Arms fit great! Torso length a little too (6") long when stretched out to it's length. If you zip and fold under, then it sits properly at my waist because the waistband on the jacket holds very snug to your body. I am 6'3" and my arm length from shoulder to wrist for tailoring is 27 1/8 - 1/4" and I have a 38" waistline and I weigh approximately 218lbs.
Bought this for my daughter. We washed it and the zipper came off. I had to fix the zipper. Other then that good sweater. I just hope the zipper doesn’t keep coming off.
Bought this for my son. He loves it and it keeps him warm. Only issue is that the zipper slider fell off when I washed the hoodie.
I just wanted a well made hoodie with deep pockets and that's what I got.

product details.description: NIKE HOODIE: Nike hoodies for men combine classic style with the soft comfort of fleece for an elevated look that you can wear everyday..SOFT COMFORT: Nike sweatshirts for men are lined with a brushed-back fleece material that keeps you warm. The fleece feels soft against the skin during wear..ADJUSTABLE COVERAGE: The men's hoodies contain a drawstring rim that offers adjustable coverage. Customize your fit to be loose during relaxation or fitted during play..KANGAROO POCKET: Large kangaroo pocket on the front side of the hoodie can keep hands warm or store small items during movement..

Product reviews.review: Great quality hoodie, very comfortable and soft. True to size. Good looking hoodie! Price is worth it. Will buy more! Try one!
This hoodie is very classy looking. Fuzzy inside but outside is smooth as satin. Plenty warm enough & comfortable. True to size.

Nike Men's Pull Over HoodieI purchased this hoodie and in two days it wss on the doorstep...!Fits great - Great price - Super fast shipping ...!This is the second one i bought from this seller and I plan on getting another one.
My son loves this Nike hoodie. Price was reasonable hoodie fit him well true to size washes great.
Very comfy and fits perfectly
Bought this for our 16yr old grandson for Christmas and he loved it!!
Nike is on point.
My son wears this a lot and it's holding up nicely after washes. Minimal shrinking after first wash and still nice and soft.
Fits great and color is nice tone
It’s a gift for my grandson for Christmas. But I’m sure he’ll love it

product details.description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.BRUSHED FLEECE: 8.3 oz brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece keeps you warm. Hood and body lined with cozy sherpa fleece. Sleeves lined with jersey..HOODED SWEATSHIRT: This classic zip-up hoodie is a go-to cold weather layer. The sherpa lining adds an additional level of warmth..DETAILS: Full length front zipper, metal grommets and drawcord on hood, front pockets, and rib trim at the hem and cuffs.
product details.productName: Amazon Essentials Men's Sherpa-Lined Full-Zip Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt

Product reviews.review: Wonderful color, style, texture and weight. His eyes lit up and he said, ‘Nice’ when he opened it. He’s a guy of few expectations and needs. But this really made him take notice. This is no cheap sweatshirt. It is nicely made, the Sherpa is thick and warm. The zipper is quality. This will wear well and last a long time. Great buy!
Great hoodie. Great price. The hoodie is very warm and comfortable, especially the hood. I’m 5’6”, 165, and the medium is a perfect fit. Get this hoodie. You can thank me later.
Warm, comfy and a perfect fit.  Made well and great colors.  My finicky  adult son generally  doesn’t like anything I get for him to wear.  But this time I scored!!!!  Yay, mom!  I’ll be back!

I bought one of these for my husband and liked it enough to buy one for myself. Only problem was figuring out what size to get (I'm a 4'11", 139 lb woman, but prefer men's sweatshirts). I initially ordered a medium that was too big and exchanged it for a small which fits fine. I initially didn't like the way the small looked (it was baggy in weird places), but it was that the fabric was a bit stiff from being in the bag. Once I wore it in a bit, it was fine. I haven't washed it yet, but based on the other reviews I'll probably hang dry it to avoid shrinking.Overall the quality is good! Fabric is soft; stitching is even and appears reinforced around seams and pockets. Among similar, sherpa-lined sweatshirts, I chose this one because the sherpa lining is only in the chest area - the sleeves are lined with cotton which feels less itchy when wearing t-shirts underneath.

This jacket is fully Sherpa lined in the entire back and front insides, however the sleeves are jersey lined which makes it more comfortable and not so bulky! I walk my dog early morning and later evening so this jacket is perfect for colder months! (I live in an area that doesn’t get real cold in the winter.) I bought a larger size that I really need which will be good to wear a sweater under if needed. I’m very happy with this jacket! I will say it’s more for my walks than out on the town.
The fit was perfect,  true to size. Good quality.  Very warm and soft.

I started to wear this right out of the bag.  It is 37F where I live and this is great for quick trips to the store or shopping where I don't need a coat.  The fake lambs wool is very warm and comfortable.  It is made very well with excellent stitching.  Now I need to order one for my wife.
I wish the sweater was a little longer!

This is a beautiful sweatshirt and everything that I was expecting. I read previous reviews where some recommended that you order a size up. I would absolutely agree with that. I typically only order a size large, but took the advice and ordered an XL and it fits perfectly. There’s a little room in there for a button down shirt or a light sweater without it feeling too snug or binding.  I’m 6’-1, 195lbs.

The first thing that caught my eye was the modern and minimalist design of the hoodie. The black color gives it a timeless and versatile look, making it easy to pair with various outfits. Whether I'm heading to the gym, running errands, or just lounging at home, this hoodie effortlessly fits into any setting.The fit of the hoodie is just right – not too baggy, not too tight. It provides enough room for movement without sacrificing style. The cuffs and hem are well-designed, ensuring that the hoodie stays in place without riding up.Overall, I highly recommend the Black Men's Zip-Up Hoodie for anyone in search of a reliable, stylish, and comfortable addition to their wardrobe. It's a versatile piece that effortlessly combines fashion and function, making it a must-have for every man's closet.

product details.description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.BRUSHED FLEECE: 8.3 oz soft brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece for staying cozy and keeping warm..HOODED SWEATSHIRT: A classic everyday essential, this hooded sweatshirt is casual and comfortable. Throw it on for running errands or layer it with a collared shirt for a more dressed up look..DETAILS: Jersey-lined hood has metal eyelets and an adjustable drawcord. Heavyweight rib trim at sleeve and bottom hems and a kangaroo pocket on the front.
product details.productName: Amazon Essentials Men's Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall)

Product reviews.review: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the softness of these sweatshirts.  I figured for the price they were going to appear cheap but they are very nice.  Fit well according to size.

This hoodie is very comfortable soft. The material is not super thick, but warm enough to keep you warm on a cool day. The hood is on the large side, so there is plenty of room to wear a beanie or other hat underneath.

I bought this for a male friend for Christmas. I thought I bought an XL and gave it to him. He tried it on and it was very snug. I was going to return it but decided to try it on myself and it fit perfectly!  I looked at the label and I bought a men’s small. I’m 6’ about 140lb (female). Keeping it and might buy more in different colors.

Nice not too thick or thin Hoody with kangaroo pockets. Soft and nice color, only thing I didn't like was the neck part is a little tight, my neck size shirt is 15 1/2. Got medium and rest of fit was good, didn't seem to shrink after wash and no pilling.

This hoodie is worth it. It is at an affordable price in my opinion. I genuinely bought this for work due to me being outside and the temperatures dropping. When I threw this on to make sure it fit, I was hit with coziness, softness, and warmth. I fell in love with this hoodie almost instantly. I highly recommend this hoodie to anyone that wants to stay warm for the winter.
This Sweatshirt was soft and cozy. Looks youthfull and stylish at any age. I bought this for my husband and he loved it.

Very comfortable, the quality is pretty good it hasn't pilled and I've had it for over a year. The bottom elastic band it not tight at all so it will stay at the same width as the bottom of the sweatshirt. The hood is fine but the neck hole is a little on the small side if your looking for a wider hood. Cuffs are not too tight.

Edit(they sent me a light grey zip up...)I'd still not this at meh. I bought a new washing machine as my old was was on the fritz so I figured it was time to replace, did a load of the six I ordered between my wife and I, still somewhat soft but it's not going to last. Overall they are cheap and after some sewing to repair some shoddy fabric work they seem strong. Had to send two back as I got one that was a zip up and completely different color, and another that had a longer arm. I mean wtf. I suppose the cokune I purchased gave me a higher chance at getting something off but to Amazon, go inspect where you've got the manufacturer in Vietnam and see how well the conditions and quality of work actually are. I'm seeing a lot of errors in the seams, had to use a stitch puller to fix the black one and repaired the grey. I grew up around seamstress so suppose that knowledge was useful (also great for diy stitches) but most people wouldn't see this. Sure it would have lasted a few months before a tear or the fabric just unraveled, but these def need to be made better to avoid these problems. Changing to 3*. Doesn't mean they are bad but so many problems with a set of hoodies. Still, after the repairs I spent 50 bucks and got six of them (with my cc credits) but even buying straight out ten of these you're set for a long time if you can sew, understand seams and it came to the same price of a Quicksilver hoodie. Plus different colors. I see a lot of reviews on how they LOVE IT but it's from people that just put it on. They are pretty nice and soft out of the package, they will degrade. Interior fabric ain't bad tho.Edit done-----Not bad, but cheap. Pilling from the first wash, washed exactly as directed and did not use much heat to dry. Pilling. The sleeve at the wrist tore at the seam. Shrunk quite a bit and isn't soft anymore.It's a cheap hoodie and I'll wear it happily, but I've needed to sew it already, needed to shave it which upon a second gentle wash it's like I never did anything to depill.Don't expect high quality. It is somewhat comfortable and was soft, but it's a hoodie and that's really all there is to it. If you're looking for something that will last this is not a great buy, if you're looking for something like a cheap hoodie then look no further.Amazon won't let me review the grey one I bought for myself, but I got my wife a Navy one. Soft like mine was. Not going to stay that way, and I don't expect it to take any kind of wear and tear long. But it's cheap.Don't go for prime since this is "reserved" for prime members. I don't plan on buyinf another one but we will see, sometimes even good quality items have bad makes. These are made in Vietnam, not familiar with products coming out of Nam, and don't know if it's like puther certain countries that make their convicts make clothing. I'll have to look that up now. The price is great but if you want that "one" hoodie, spend extra to buy a good brand and made properly. Something study, but for the value here perhaps I'll buy more to see if I just had a mishap, plus you can't ever have enough hoodies!Still, good for the cost! Seems a negative, so I'm sort of meh about it. Wanted to replace my old hoodie I've had for five years now that the wrists have started the fray, but the overall durability of that thing (target brand) was so much stronger. I'd have to look to see if either clothing is being made more cheap or if this is just flat cheap. None of my zip ups or quick silvers do this, target brand (whatever the name of that is) and even an old walmaet brand beats this out, and isn't much more expensive.EDITSo I had ordered another one for my wife (navy blue) and I really wanted to just switch my Heather grey for that navy. It was still sort while mine pilled and tore, had to see the sleeve collars, etc. So I decided, you know what, I never said a word about the price, just the quality. I wore my grey often and yes it's pilling (getting little knots, fabric falls out, will wear out quickly) but for SIX of them, you got the price of a high quality hoodie and you've got six different colors, maybe got a fee zip ups, multiple colors, whatever. That's a damn good deal and I commend Amazon for it.So I ordered myself a replacement grey, a black, a green, and a navy. PTSD problems but whatever, that's not a serious issue of how bad the PTSD I've seen has, no need to talk about my line of work for how I got it.I got all of them in the mail by a friendly gentleman, needed to use the restroom ( I live at my business) opened them up when I felt it was time to break, and got a black, green, and then I saw the dark grey was a ZIP UP and damn near white. I don't do anything that isn't dark, doesn't look good. So I tried the Navy k got for my wife. The right shoulder was a bit longer than the other and it left a pointed shoulder. The rest are all well built expect that collar sleeve but was stretching, though just with my fingers and opening them up. Can't believe it tore. So I sent them back. They shipped me two new ones that will be here in two days, will be sending me a different blue and hopefully the right grey and won't be all screwed up. They gave me six hours to return my others so while I'm working overtime and no pay, I have a UPS store too minutes away so barely made that ridiculous time frameSo out of six so far, I got one that isn't even the grey or a pull over (see other review's, this seems a complaint and needed to be addressed. NEVER say anything about azons shipping. Some have been bad but it's pretty damn good.I'd even bought a new washer and dryer ( it was flooding from the washer and needed replacement, this months been fubar) and will update when I get the right items and do a few washes. It took two prior to get it s helluva lot less soft and shrunk.--------++++---------+++++Too damn long didn't read:So risks. Poorly made. Wrong item.Often pills and makes small patches that aren't soft and you need to shave them to keep it soft after two washes, cold water, in soft quality liquid soap. It shrunk after being in a bit high temps for a very short time period, and cannot be washed in anything but cold. Bad stains say nope.It didn't shrink THAT bad but sits at the waist, don't raise your arms lol)Is still comfortable but cheap, seams come apart, not badly but needs sewingCHEAP, great value and actually GOOD but you may need to send it back or wash it carefullyOverall C+Just get the right stuff to you and take care on washing it. It took two washes and some slight heat to make it much, much less soft and shrunk. I'll be updating this later for various reasons. I've noticed people buying the grey Heather are getting the light grey zip up. We didn't order that. I know no one wants it. Go home Amazon, you're drunk.

I wanted a different color hoodie but, didn't want to break the bank to get one. Found this color and made the purchase; glad I did. It's very comfortable and after 2 washes it still holds true to the original size.
The product was too big at first. I washed the sweater and it srunk making it the perfect fit

product details.productName: True Religion Men's Buddha Logo Zip Hoodie Sweatshirt

Product reviews.review: 180 lbs and 6 feet tall the 3xl fits perfectly! Material is so comfy. Impressed!
for my beautiful boyfriend for valentines day🩷came perfectly in time good quality and everything!
Cómo a mi me gusta la ropa
It’s a good jacket but I saw reviews saying to size up and as a 6’3 guy yes you should size up I’m originally XL but got a XXL and it fits well besides that nothing everything’s alr
it runs small so you might wanna size up
My son loved it nice quality.

The stitching is awful if it was true religion it would of been way brighter plus the tag is what pisses me off it’s supposed to be the one with the buddha the quality is very bad it’s so thin I can see light through it and the sizing should not be a problem if it the original true religion I had to size up don’t buy this if you want to waste ur money
It’s perfect! It was true to size and the material is great.
GET A SIZE UP!! im size l but even so its was a little tight so it’s better to get a size up for a better fit
It’s cool

product details.description: 60% Cotton/40% Polyester.Heavyweight fabric hoodie with front pouch pocket.Constructed with soft and durable 13oz 60 percent ring-spun cotton, 40 percent polyester fleece.Relaxed fit for superior comfort.World famous for its premium thickness and weight
product details.productName: Pro Club Men's Heavyweight Pullover Hoodie (13oz)

Product reviews.review: Purchased as a gift for a teenager, hoping it was the real thing. A week after opening, he finally took it off so it could be washed. I’ve ordered another in a different color now. Very nice heavy fabric.
Great fit, warm, and cozy. I’m a big boy and this fit me good not so tight on my chest. Proclub doesn’t disappoint
Great quality, nice and heavy. This is the third one I’ve purchased.
A little long in the arms but other then that fits nicely. Its a lot thicker then your average hoodie so its a lot warmer in the cold weather
great fit!!

I was hesitant in getting these, as the fit seemed to be a little off according to some reviews, and bottom of sweatshirt and pants waistband are a little snug, but not overly, and plenty roomy and long in the bodies, which we like.  Impressed with the weight, thickness and SOFT.  Just got them, so will see in the long run, but so far our favorites to date, especially for the price.  Like the hood better, too, more to it, seems to fit around the head/face better & stay better.  Like the adjustable pull-cords at the bottom of the pants, because we usually prefer the elastic cuff.  The length of each is better/warmer, and they seem to be very good quality.  Will wash in cold and fluff or air dry to avoid possible shrinkage in waist/bands of each.  We really like them.  Will update as worn/washed

I have always been a huge fan of pro club clothing. The reason why I choose pro club over any other brand is because of the quality  and longevity of their products. Just like the plain pro club shirts that I wear, these hoodies will last a long time. Not to mention, they are incredibly thick and warm, which makes it perfect for the winter. They are pretty stretchy at the bottom too and will stick to your waist to prevent cold air from getting inside. They’re not just warm, but also very stylish and with this charcoal gray color, I can wash it many times without having to worry about signs of fading or discoloration. i should have ordered this hoodie sooner instead of wasting my money on overpriced Nikey and adidas garbage that become thin and faded over time after a few wash and dry cycles. I’m not buying any other hoodie other than pro club from now on.

Had to try this on immediately and it fit like a glove.....I mean perfectly⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ The material feels great and it fits great......I am one satisfied customer with this pullover! I do wish the price was a little bit lower, but a great purchase nonetheless!
My husband really likes this hoodie. It’s really warm and fits well. He’s 6’5” 250 and I bought him a size XXL. I would definitely recommend this hoodie.
Bought one a year ago for northern Michigan winter climate.  This thing is insanely warm.  Be prepared to take it off when going out to eat or even shopping at the grocery store!

product details.description: THE CLASSIC GAP LOOK: A favorite piece that looks great on everyone and with everything, this hoodie is an essential for any wardrobe.SUPER SOFT FLEECE KNIT: Each pullover is made from a cozy cotton blend, and features long sleeves, a hooded neckline, ribbed cuffs and hem, and a front kanga pocket.MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy to care for, this sweatshirt can be washed with like colors on the gentle cycle.THE SIGNATURE LOGO COLLECTION: Instantly recognizable and always iconic, our signature logo apparel transcends all ages and backgrounds, and conveys the ethos and style that Gap is known all around the world for.
product details.productName: GAP Men's Logo Fleece Hoodie Hooded Sweatshirt

Product reviews.review: Very good.

I’m a female and really only wear hoodies instead of coats because they are less constricting while driving and I don’t have to carry a coat around the store. My hubby bought me this and the size small fits great and is warm enough for me.

I think this has got to be one of the best hoodies I ever invested in and I am so proud to own one of these if I can give y'all more than five stars I would on top of that I love Gap I love how they made the logo on there it's all thick and soft it feels great on my skin y'all did a great job with this one
Warm, looks just like picture and holds up well in the wash.
Runs a bit small. I would recommend going up a size or two depending on how you like it to fit. Will buy again
Nice and comfy
This was a gift given to an extremely picky teenager, an he loved it!  He has long arms an torso, which is why an adult small is most of the time our better option.  Fit him perfectly.
Great for keeping you warm here in Florida.
Excelente calidad
Es holgado así que si eres S tal vez si gustas de usar ropa ceñida un XS te acomode mejor. Excelente calidad !

product details.description: Adjustable three-piece hood with soft jersey lining.Kangaroo pocket.Brushed fleece for lightweight warmth.Imported

Product reviews.review: The Ariat hoodie in a soothing shade of blue is a delightful addition to any casual wardrobe, especially for those who value comfort and style. Crafted from soft, high-quality fabric, it offers an exceptional level of warmth and coziness, making it perfect for chilly days. The hoodie's design strikes a balance between a relaxed fit and a flattering silhouette, suitable for various body types.One of the standout features of this hoodie is its durability. Despite its softness, the material holds up well to regular wear and washing, maintaining both its color and shape. This makes it a practical choice for everyday use.The blue color of the hoodie is vibrant yet versatile, easy to pair with jeans, leggings, or other casual bottoms. It also features the subtle yet recognizable Ariat logo, which adds a touch of elegance to the overall design.Overall, this Ariat hoodie is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a blend of comfort, style, and durability. Its warmth, softness, and appealing color make it a go-to item for both indoor lounging and outdoor activities.

The unique patterns and accents add a touch of modern flair to the classic hoodie style. It's refreshing to see a brand infuse creativity into everyday casual wear, and Ariat has done just that with the Aztek design. It's a subtle yet stylish nod to the brand's commitment to both fashion and functionality.The fit is spot-on. The sweatshirt drapes comfortably without being too loose or too tight. The hood is generously sized, adding that extra level of coziness on chilly days. The overall design is not only fashionable but also functional, making it suitable for both casual outings and lounging at home.It has withstood multiple washes without losing its shape or vibrant color. The quality stitching and reinforced seams are a testament to the craftsmanship that Ariat is known for, ensuring that this sweatshirt will be a long-lasting addition to my wardrobe.
Fits great and true to picture!

I buy Ariat brand all of the time for my husband as we both wear it and absolutely love it. The quality is fabulous and the fabric is so comfortable. The fit is Always perfect. This is the area sweatshirt that I got him for Christmas this year and it did not disappoint! The fit is perfect for a big and tall guy
Fits decent and feels good but very thin lightweight material.  Definitely not for those cold days, more of a windbreaker!!!

I bought the large in my normal size with the Chimayo Navy pattern and it fit perfectly. The length fits my longer than average torso and the band around the waist is not so tight that it rides up on me like some sweatshirts. If you wish to have a more loose-fitting hoodie you could go up a size. Besides the length, I have had issues with other hoodies being too thick, and the hood itself being a constant reminder on my neck that it's there. With this hoodie its forgettable until you need it. The hoodie I bought is made up of 52% Cotton & 48% Polyester giving it a medium weight that is both stylish and practical.I probably would not buy this hoodie in one of the solid colors since I have many like it already, but the Southwestern pattern helps it stand out from the rest. Five stars from me given it's fit, warmth, and pattern.
This is nice. Feels great
It was very soft and fit perfect! Reccomend 100000%
Comfortable and warm. Seems well made, not a cheap hoodie that shrinks up after washing. Good for moderately cold days, no jacket needed.
I loved the color and the back had a really cute picture! I’m a girl and i would still wear this!

product details.description: THE CLASSIC GAP LOOK: A favorite piece that looks great on everyone and with everything, this hoodie is an essential for any wardrobe.SUPER SOFT FLEECE KNIT: Each zip-up sweatshirt is made from a cozy cotton blend, and features long sleeves, a hooded neckline, ribbed cuffs and hem, and a front pockets.MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy to care for, this sweatshirt can be washed with like colors on the gentle cycle.THE SIGNATURE LOGO COLLECTION: Instantly recognizable and always iconic, our signature logo apparel transcends all ages and backgrounds, and conveys the ethos and style that Gap is known all around the world for.
product details.productName: GAP Men's Logo Hoodie Hooded Full Zip Sweatshirt
